docs.snippet: The Commissioners on the Quarantine damages met yesterday at 10 o'clock. After a brief cross-examination of Dr. THOMPSON'S housekeeper, in which nothing material was elicited, Dr. WM. ROCKWELL was sworn. He deposed as follows:

headline.main: QUARANTINE DAMAGES INVESTIGATION.; TESTIMONY OF DRS. THOMPSON AND ROCKWELL.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Commissioners on the Quarantine damages met yesterday at 10 o'clock. After a brief cross-examination of Dr. THOMPSON'S housekeeper, in which nothing material was elicited, Dr. WM. ROCKWELL was sworn. He deposed as follows:

docs.snippet: THE LEE-AVENUE SUNDAY SCHOOL JUBILEE.  One of the most delightful of the Strawberry and Floral Festivals of the season was enjoyed yesterday in Mr. BREVOORT'S grove, in Bedford, Long Island.
docs.lead_paragraph: THE LEE-AVENUE SUNDAY SCHOOL JUBILEE. One of the most delightful of the Strawberry and Floral Festivals of the season was enjoyed yesterday in Mr. BREVOORT'S grove, in Bedford, Long Island.

docs.snippet: Mr. James M. Pushee, of Massachusetts, came to this City on the 19th inst., for the purpose of procuring second-class cabin passages by the California steamer for his sister, Mrs. Elmira F. Choate, and her little boy.

headline.main: Police Reports.; ANOTHER VICTIM SWINDLED BY ENRIGHT AND GORDON. POLICEMEN CHARGED WITH RUFFIANLY CONDUCT AT THE JAPANESE BALL. EMBEZZLEMENT BY A BOOK-KEEPER. A WEIGHTY THEFT.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. James M. Pushee, of Massachusetts, came to this City on the 19th inst., for the purpose of procuring second-class cabin passages by the California steamer for his sister, Mrs. Elmira F. Choate, and her little boy.

docs.snippet: The Royal Mail steamship Europa, Capt. LEITCH, from Liverpool on the 16th inst. via Queenstown on the l7th inst., has arrived at this port.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal Mail steamship Europa, Capt. LEITCH, from Liverpool on the 16th inst. via Queenstown on the l7th inst., has arrived at this port.

docs.snippet: The Tribune yesterday announced that the City Inspector, Mr. DELAVAN, has appointed JOHN E. ENRIGHT to be one of the Health Wardens of the City. As we have seen no contradiction of the statement, we are constrained --discreditable as it is to a City...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Tribune yesterday announced that the City Inspector, Mr. DELAVAN, has appointed JOHN E. ENRIGHT to be one of the Health Wardens of the City. As we have seen no contradiction of the statement, we are constrained --discreditable as it is to a City officer whom we have found frequent occasion to commend--to believe it to be true. Who and what this man ENRIGHT IS, the community in general need not be informed.

docs.snippet: The Commissioners appointed by the Legislature to inquire into and determine the amount of damages suffered by the State, and by various individuals, in the destructicn of the Quarantine establishment, resumed their sessions yesterday, after a recess...

headline.main: QUARANTINE DAMAGES INVESTIGATION.; CLAIM OF DR. R.H. THOMPSON.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Commissioners appointed by the Legislature to inquire into and determine the amount of damages suffered by the State, and by various individuals, in the destructicn of the Quarantine establishment, resumed their sessions yesterday, after a recess of ten days.

docs.snippet: Hon. WILLIAM PENNINGTON, Speaker of the House of Representatives, left Washington yesterday morning and arrived at his home, in Newark, at 9 o'clock last evening. A large concourse of people, comprising men of all parties, had collected at the depot...

headline.main: SPEAKER PENNINGTON AT HOME.; Enthusiastic Reception by his Constituents --Reception Speech by Cortlandt Parker and Reply of Mr. Pennington.

docs.lead_paragraph: Hon. WILLIAM PENNINGTON, Speaker of the House of Representatives, left Washington yesterday morning and arrived at his home, in Newark, at 9 o'clock last evening. A large concourse of people, comprising men of all parties, had collected at the depot awaiting his arrival, and the enthusiastic cheers which greeted his return testified to the universal popularity which he enjoys among all classes of his fellow-townsmen.

docs.snippet: The House acceded to the request of the Senate to appoint another Committee of Conference on the Post-office Deficiency bill.
docs.lead_paragraph: The House acceded to the request of the Senate to appoint another Committee of Conference on the Post-office Deficiency bill.
